name: ToggleGroup.Root
description: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off.
description_zh: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the toggle group when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control the state of the toggle group.
defaultValue.description_zh:
首次渲染切换组时的初始值。
在不需要控制切换组的状态时使用。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; item(value: string): string }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the toggle. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 切换中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

loopFocus.description: Whether to loop focus inside the toggle group.
loopFocus.description_zh: 是否在切换组内循环聚焦。

multiple.description: Whether to allow multiple toggles to be selected.
multiple.description_zh: 是否允许选择多个切换。

orientation.description: The orientation of the toggle group.

rovingFocus.description: Whether to use roving tab index to manage focus.
rovingFocus.description_zh: 是否使用浮动选项卡索引来管理焦点。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: The callback fired when the model value changes.
events.description_zh: 当 model 值更改时触发回调。

events.name: valueChange
events.description: Function to call when the toggle is clicked.
events.description_zh: 单击切换开关时调用的函数。
